entry.source: {F812}Wu Kong\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411000}You again! You know, you're pretty{F801}good for a human!{F801}{F802}But you're not going to catch me{F801}that easily!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Wu Kong\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411000}You again! You know, you're pretty{F801}good for a human!{F801}{F802}But you're not going to catch me{F801}that easily!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Wu Kong\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411007}Damn, what's with this guy...!?{F801}{F802}Y-You'll never catch me!{F801}You hear me? Never!{F801}
